string.text: PK-1 "Obzor" (1P63) Collimator Sight

A rugged Russian collimator sight designed for rapid target acquisition in combat environments. Featuring an illuminated reticle and durable construction, it is widely used on AK-pattern rifles for close to medium-range engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]NPZ Optics State Plant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x
PK-06 Reflex Sight

A compact, lightweight reflex sight with a selectable reticle for versatility in different shooting scenarios. Its open design and parallax-free optics make it ideal for fast target acquisition in CQB and tactical applications.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]BelOMO
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1x
Pilad P1x42

A durable, enclosed reflex sight with a wide field of view and a bright red-dot reticle. Designed for both civilian and tactical use, it offers reliable performance on rifles and carbines.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]VOMZ
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x

A Russian military-grade reflex sight known for its toughness and clear optics. Designed for rapid aiming in dynamic combat situations, it provides a crisp reticle for enhanced accuracy in close to mid-range engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Valday
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x
VOMZ Pilad P4x32

A fixed 4x magnification scope providing enhanced precision for medium-range shooting. Featuring a sturdy design and clear optics, it is commonly used on hunting and tactical rifles.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]VOMZ
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x
PO4x34

A Soviet-era fixed 4x magnification scope with a distinctive rangefinder reticle. Designed for designated marksman rifles, it provides reliable accuracy for medium-range engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]TsKIB SOO
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]4.0x

A high-end Russian optical sight featuring an advanced illuminated reticle and rugged construction. Optimized for tactical operations, it offers enhanced target visibility in various lighting conditions.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Valday
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x or 6.0x
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] %c[ui_gray_2]LED Toggle

A versatile low-power variable optic (LPVO) with a 1-4x magnification range, ideal for close to medium-range shooting. Built for fast target transitions and precision shots, it is a favorite among tactical shooters and competition marksmen.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Burris
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x - 4.0x
ROMEO4 Reflex Sight

A high-performance red-dot sight designed for rapid target acquisition in dynamic shooting scenarios. With motion-activated illumination and a rugged design, it excels in both tactical and sporting applications.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]SIG Sauer
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x
ROMEO8T Reflex Sight

A military-grade reflex sight featuring a large viewing window and multiple reticle options. Built to withstand extreme conditions, it provides fast, accurate aiming for professional operators.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]SIG Sauer
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x
ACRO P-1 Reflex Sight

A compact, enclosed red-dot sight designed for use on pistols and rifles. Offering exceptional durability and battery life, it is ideal for duty, defense, and competition shooting.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Sweden
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Aimpoint
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x
Specter HCO Holo Sight

A premium holographic sight designed for military and law enforcement use. Combining durability with a crisp illuminated reticle, it enables rapid target engagement in CQB and mid-range combat.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Raytheon ELCAN Optical Technologies
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x
Compact Prism Scope 2x32

A compact, fixed 2x magnification prismatic scope featuring a 32mm objective lens, designed for rapid target acquisition at close to mid-range distances. Its glass prism optical system ensures sharp image quality in a durable, lightweight package.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Monstrum Tactical
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]2.0x
Trihawk Prism Scope 3x30

A robust 3x prism scope with an ultra-wide field of view and illuminated reticle. Designed for fast target acquisition and durability, it is well-suited for tactical and sporting applications.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]SwampFox Optics
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]3.0x
ADO P4 Sniper Optic 3-9x42

A variable-magnification scope with an integrated red dot sight for dual aiming capabilities. Built for precision shooting, it offers versatility in both short and long-range engagements.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]NcSTAR
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]3.0 - 9.0x
Armasight Vulcan MG 3.5x Bravo NVS

A night vision scope with 3.5x magnification, designed for tactical and reconnaissance operations in low-light conditions. Featuring advanced image intensification, it provides enhanced target detection and engagement at extended ranges.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]United States
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Armasight
